title: Webpack project
list: Watch mode auto reload page after any changes in project files
HTML engine all static pages should be placed in /src folder with .html extension
Public files engine files which should be available in root of the site need to place in /src/public folder
post-css parser (use scss syntax for editor) allows to use modern CSS syntax like variables, nesting etc

ES6 syntax available to use in all js files.
All js modules should be placed in /src/js folder and imported in app file (entry point)
